text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: The ocean!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
No sooner do we arrive at summer<n>camp than Fine Motion
takes off to<n>marvel at the sea.
choice_data_list: Fine, is this your first time at a beach?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: No, far from it. Though it is thefirst time I've been to one with somany friends. It's like a dream cometrue.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Hehe, the sensation of sand betweenmy toes, and just... everything. Itfeels like such a treasure to be here!
choice_data_list: The perfect place to spread your wings, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
It really is! Oh—is that a hermit crab? I<n>wonder if it's looking
for a new shell.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Hey, little guy. Can I help you look? I<n>bet this beach is full of
beautiful<n>shells!

text_block_list.name: Fine's Friend A
text_block_list.text:
All right, are we all ready to run some<n>laps? ...Hang on,
where'd Fine go?

text_block_list.name: Fine's Friend B
text_block_list.text:
Oh, there she is! Looks like she's<n>already started jogging!
C'mon, let's<n>hurry and catch up!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Fine Motion runs down the shoreline,<n>beaming. Time flies,
and camp goes<n>by in a happy blur.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Before we know it, it's the evening of<n>our last night. Fine
and I decide to<n>spend it at the local festival.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Mmm, that was lovely! What was<n>"candy floss" in
Japanese, again?<n>"Wata-ame," right? The way it melts<n>in
your mouth is so delightful!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
...Hehe. All this training, and playing,<n>and cooking, and
treasure hunts.<n>Ghost stories and now a big festival...<n>This
camp really had it all.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Ah! Fireworks!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: They're so... so beautiful...

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
...And then in a blink, they're<n>memories—like all the other
precious<n>moments we shared.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
I think, maybe it's their fleeting nature<n>that makes them
linger so vividly in<n>the mind when they're gone. Do you<n>
know what I mean?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
...Ah, no, I'm sorry. I hope I didn't<n>spoil the festival mood
with the<n>sentimental talk.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
What do you say we give the stalls<n>another round? I
spotted a sign for<n>jumbo takoyaki down that way!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We wander for a while, chatting and<n>snacking, and end
summer camp on a<n>high note.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Whew! That's the whole training set<n>for today, I believe. It
feels like it's<n>been forever since I ran on the<n>academy
track.
choice_data_list:
Everything's settled back into the usual routine,
huh?

Everything's settled back into the usual routine,
huh?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Agreed. Although, you never know<n>when life will surprise
you.
choice_data_list: Is that a cue for another dragon attack?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, I'm afraid not this time.<n>Though it would be fun to
have little<n>surprises like the lost kitty. You know,<n>just from
time to time.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Well, I don't know what I expected.Not that I want there to be lostpets, mind you. Ahaha.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: ...Eh? Is this... instant ramen? Was<n>this always here?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I almost forgot. When I cleaned up<n>after our feline visitor, I
moved my<n>emergency snack stash. I can't<n>believe I left
ramen out where Fine<n>could see it...

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Ooh, Shura Ramen III? I don't think<n>I've ever seen this kind!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Really?! Thank you, Trainer! Let me<n>boil some water...
choice_data_list:
Now? Are you sure? I don't have anything else
to put in it.

Now? Are you sure? I don't have anything else
to put in it.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
...Hm? What do you mean? I thought<n>you only needed
water.
choice_data_list:
But you could add other ingredients if you
wanted. Aside from the fridge being empty, I
mean.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
You... can? You can add other things?!<n>But that means... the
possibilities are<n>infinite!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Oh my goodness! My mind is racing<n>with ideas already! I
have to try them<n>all!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Trainer! Why don't we make a quick<n>grocery run? Let's
make our very<n>own ramen together!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And without a moment's delay,<n>we're out the door, on our
way to<n>explore the noodley miracles of the<n>local market.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Hmm hm hmm hm hmmm ♪ We've<n>got sprouts, lettuce,
mushrooms,<n>minced meat, and eggs.

text_block_list.name: Fine's Friend A
text_block_list.text: Ah, hey Fine! Whatcha up to?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Hehehe. Well, my trainer and I are<n>planning to test the best
toppings for<n>instant ramen, so we're out buying<n>
ingredients.

text_block_list.name: Fine's Friend B
text_block_list.text:
Ramen toppings? I guess you could<n>try some random meat
and cabbage.<n>That's what we'd usually toss in<n>back
home.

text_block_list.name: Fine's Friend A
text_block_list.text:
My dad would always put weird pub<n>snacks in ours. Like
he'd put dried<n>salami in, and call it his house<n>special...

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Ooh, you've made original ramenbefore? You have to tell me more!We could all have a big ramen tastingparty!

text_block_list.name: Fine's Friend B
text_block_list.text:
If we play our cards right, Fine'll<n>make it a high-society
sensation or<n>something. Can you imagine—royal<n>instant
ramen!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With Fine's friends along for the ride,<n>we grab a couple
more ingredients<n>and head back to my office.

text_block_list.name: Everyone
text_block_list.text: Sláinte!

text_block_list.name: Fine's Friend A
text_block_list.text:
Mmm... Y'know, this salami isn't half<n>bad. It's kinda like
those pork flavor<n>packets, but actual meat.

text_block_list.name: Fine's Friend B
text_block_list.text:
The crab sticks I put in work pretty<n>well too. They add like, I
dunno... an<n>extra layer of flavor, I guess?

text_block_list.name: Fine's Friend A
text_block_list.text:
...An "extra layer." I bet you sound like<n>a food reporter in
your head, huh?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha! They really do taste<n>completely different, though. I
might try<n>making it for my parents some time,<n>when I'm
back.

text_block_list.name: Fine's Friend B
text_block_list.text:
Now we're talking! If any of their<n>friends in high places
want my secret<n>recipe, I wouldn't mind sharing—as<n>long
as they pay me royalties.

text_block_list.name: Fine's Friend A
text_block_list.text:
Please. As if you invented grocery<n>store ramen. Can it, or
your<n>masterpiece is gonna go cold.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Exactly, and the noodles go limp if<n>they sit too long. Ramen
is best right in<n>the moment!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: It... it all is, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Hehe... Nothing, I just realized<n>something important, thanks
to you<n>three.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Big special events are all well and<n>good, but I don't have to
make<n>everything an occasion.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
There's a lot to be said for simply<n>enjoying the time I get to
spend with<n>you here and now. Every day is a<n>treasure.
choice_data_list: ...Yeah. I think you're on to something.
...Yeah. I think you're on to something.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Hehe. Well then, before things go<n>cold...

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Let's savor what's in front of us. We<n>can waffle on about
the future when it<n>gets here. Right?
